<file>
00001| # <a name="up"/>Vozovoz API 2.5
00002| 
00003| [Main page](/en/README.md) > [Request data structures](index.md) > Services
00004| 
00005| ## Contents
00006| 
00007| * [Example](#example)
00008| * [Description](#description)
00009|     * [Loading/Offloading](#needLoading)
00010|     * [Specific transport](#specLoading)
00011|     * [Return accompanying documents](#retrieveAD)
00012| * [Where is used](#used)
00013| 
00014| ## <a name="example"/>Example
00015| 
00016| ```javascript
00017| {
00018|   "needLoading": { // "loading" service for `dispatch` or "offloading" for `destination`
00019|     "floor": 12, // floor where loading/offloading is needed
00020|     "lift": true, // sets if there's elevator in a building
00021|   },
00022|   "specificLoading": [ // "specific transport" service
00023|     'openMachine' // unique code of a transport vehicle or service
00024|   ],
00025|   "retrieveAD": { // "return accompanying documents" service (available only for dispatch)
00026|     "location": "Санкт-Петербург", // location, where to return to (you can also use unique internal ID)
00027|     "terminal": "default" // terminal, where to return to (you can also use unique internal ID)
00028|     // or use "address": "street, house"
00029|   },
00030|   "unboxingOnDelivery" : 20 // "unboxing package upon address delivery" service
00031|   // the value is the weight of the cargo, that needs unboxing, in kilograms
00032| }
00033| ```
00034| 
00035| ## <a name="description"/>Description
00036| 
00037| | Node                              | Type    | Available for                           | Description                                                                                                               |
00038| |-----------------------------------|---------|-----------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00039| | [`needLoading`](#needLoading)     | object  | `dispatch` and `destination` both       | "Loading" service for pickup at a particular address or "Offloading" for delivery to a particular address                 |
00040| | [`specificLoading`](#specLoading) | array   | `dispatch` and `destination` both       | "Specific transport" service. Array of codes, that represent types of transport needed for "loading"/"offloading" service |
00041| | [`retrieveAD`](#retrieveAD)       | object  | `dispatch` only                         | "Return accompanying documents" service                                                                                   |
00042| | [`scannedConsignationNote`](#scn) | boolean | `dispatch` only                         | Scan of a consignation note                                                                                               |
00043| | [`unboxingOnDelivery`](#uod)      | float   | `dispatch` or `destination` exclusively | Weight of the cargo after unboxing (kg) for "Unboxing on delivery" service                                                |
00044| 
00045| ### <a name="needLoading"/>Loading/Offloading
00046| 
00047| Used only when pickup/delivery option is `address`.
00048| 
00049| | Node    | Type    | Description                                                                                                                     |
00050| |---------|---------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00051| | `floor` | integer | The floor where cargo will be picked up for shipping or received respectively                                                   |
00052| | `lift`  | boolean | Is there elevator/lift to use for loading/offloading service. `false` by default _(no lift)_                                    |
00053| | `used`  | boolean | Is the service is 'on' or 'off'. Can be omitted, because is considered `true`, if the `needLoading` node passed in the request. |
00054| 
00055| ### <a name="specLoading"/>Specific transport
00056| 
00057| Used only when pickup/delivery option is `address`. The array can contain the following codes:
00058| 
00059| | Code                | Short description | Full description                                                                                                                               |
00060| |---------------------|-------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00061| | `lateralLoad`       | Lateral loading   | During loading and unloading operations, it must be possible to open the body from the side (right or left) of the vehicle.                    |
00062| | `manipulator`       | Articulated arm   | The vehicle must be equipped with a crane with a boom outreach of at least 8 meters and a lifting capacity of at least 1 ton at this outreach. |
00063| | `openMachine`       | Pick up truck     | The client is provided with a vehicle with an open body (only sides, no awning).                                                               |
00064| | `removableCurtains` | Removable awning  | During loading and unloading operations, the awning is removed from the vehicle body.                                                          |
00065| | `tailLift`          | Tail lift         | The vehicle must be equipped with a lifting mechanism (shovel-hoisting) with a lifting capacity of at least 500 kg.                            |
00066| | `topLoad`           | Removable top     | During loading and unloading operations, it must be possible to open the top of the vehicle's body for cargo loading using a lifting crane.    |
00067| 
00068| > In most cases one type excludes another, but some types don't. Ask us any questions at [api@vozovoz.ru](mailto://api@vozovoz.ru).
00069| 
00070| ### <a name="retrieveAD"/>Return accompanying documents
00071| 
00072| >Please note that by default, the data for this service is taken from the dispatch point. Therefore, if you okay with these values, you can specify:
00073| >```
00074| >{
00075| >  // place other services here or below, if you need any
00076| >  "retrieveAD": {}
00077| >  // below
00078| >}
00079| >```
00080| >Or for a simplicity in this way:
00081| >```
00082| >{
00083| >  // place other services here or below, if you need any
00084| >  "retrieveAD": {
00085| >    "used": true
00086| >  }
00087| >  // below
00088| >}
00089| 
00090| | Node       | Type    | Description                                                                                                                                                                           |
00091| |------------|---------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
00092| | `address`  | string  | Must be a string with the required address relative to the specified location. Should be omitted, if a return A.D. is required to a terminal.                                         |
00093| | `location` | string  | Can be either a unique internal location ID or a query string, for example, "Санкт-Петербург"                                                                                         |
00094| | `terminal` | string  | Can be either a unique internal terminal ID or a `default` value to select the default terminal of the specified location. Should be omitted if a return A.D. is required to address. |
00095| | `scanned`  | boolean | Set to `true` in case you also need scanned copies of accompanying documents. `false` by default.                                                                                     |
00096| | `used`     | boolean | Is the service is 'on' or 'off'. Can be omitted, because is considered `true`, if the `retrieveAD` node passed in the request.                                                        |
00097| 
00098| >If `address` and `terminal` nodes are specified simultaneously, `address` takes precedence. Carefully check the request structure before sending!
00099| >
00100| >Any of the specified nodes can be omitted (not specified), the values for it will be taken from the dispatch point `gateway.dispatch.point`
00101| 
00102| ### <a name="scn"/>Scan of consignation note
00103| 
00104| >```
00105| >{
00106| >  "scannedConsignationNote": true
00107| >}
00108| 
00109| | Node                      | Type    | Description                                          |
00110| |---------------------------|---------|------------------------------------------------------|
00111| | `scannedConsignationNote` | boolean | Is the service is 'on' of 'off'. `false` by default. |
00112| 
00113| 
00114| ### <a name="uod"/>Unboxing on delivery to an address
00115| 
00116| >```
00117| >{
00118| >  "unboxingOnDelivery": 16.3
00119| >}
00120| 
00121| | Node                 | Type  | Description                                           |
00122| |----------------------|-------|-------------------------------------------------------|
00123| | `unboxingOnDelivery` | float | Weight of the cargo (in kilograms) after the unboxing |
00124| 
00125| ## <a name="used"/>Where is used
00126| 
00127| | Object   | Action | Description                                                   |
00128| |----------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------|
00129| | `order`  | `set`  | Can be presented in `gateway.dispatch`, `gateway.destination` |
00130| | `price`  | `get`  | Can be presented in `gateway.dispatch`, `gateway.destination` |
00131| 
00132| ***
00133| [▲ Up](#up)
</file>

# <a name="up"/>Vozovoz API 2.5

[Main page](/en/README.md) > [Request data structures](index.md) > Services

## Contents

* [Example](#example)
* [Description](#description)
    * [Loading/Offloading](#needLoading)
    * [Specific transport](#specLoading)
    * [Return accompanying documents](#retrieveAD)
* [Where is used](#used)

## <a name="example"/>Example

```javascript
{
  "needLoading": { // "loading" service for `dispatch` or "offloading" for `destination`
    "floor": 12, // floor where loading/offloading is needed
    "lift": true, // sets if there's elevator in a building
